programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: Cops & Robbers
programme.desc: From a coffeeshop chain to snowy railroad tracks, these unconventional crime scenes bring the childhood game of Cops & Robbers to life.

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.sub-title: Ed and Day in the ‘Burgh: Rebuilding in Braddock
programme.desc: Ed and Day tour Day's hometown neighborhood and make delicious sweet potato pies before touring the expansive Brew Gentleman brewery in Braddock.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Chaos & Kindness: Running on Empty & Finishing with Family
programme.desc: Justin pushes body and mind through seven brutal marathons on seven continents in seven days. From frostbite in Antarctica to his daughter joining him for the final steps in Miami, this is the most intense and inspiring challenge of his life.

programme.title: Americas Most Delish
programme.sub-title: America's Most Delish Midwest: 10 Sweet Treats to Tickle Your Taste Buds from the Midwest
programme.desc: Sink your teeth into the Midwest's sweets. From the messy madness of puppy chow to kolaches to the infamous buckeye, enjoy the delicious confections that make the region a haven for dessert lovers.

programme.title: My Perfect Day
programme.sub-title: My Perfect Day with Woman's Day: Selfless Soul Receives Moments of Joy One Surprise at a Time
programme.desc: Kar is a selfless soul known for his unwavering commitment to the unhoused in his community. It's Kar's turn to have some good old-fashioned fun.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Plate It, Pittsburgh!: Spice It Up
programme.desc: This is gonna be a hot one. Chefs Ryan Grace and Roger Li are getting spicy in today’s Spice It Up challenge. Will our chefs bring the heat? Or will the competition be too hot to handle?

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Blind Kitchen: Re-creating Southern Comfort Classic vs. Elevated American Fusion
programme.desc: It’s a culinary battle of the senses between two iconic chefs in the City Beautiful. Watch as Chef Liz of Garp & Fuss in Winter Park takes on Chef Trina of Se7en Bites in The Milk District. It’s The Knife versus The Whisk!

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Smoking Gun in a Rebellious Teen’s Devastating Disappearance
programme.desc: The disappearance of 16-year-old JaRay Wilson spawns rumors of human trafficking in her small town in 2012. Investigators find her body and the truth, after an unlikely informant provides new details.

programme.title: Lowrider Legacy
programme.sub-title: Lowrider Legacy: A History of Resistance on Wheels
programme.desc: Lowrider Legacy follows celebrated lowrider families, scholars, and activists and documents the history of resistance on wheels that has defined lowrider culture.

programme.title: Show Me Milwaukee
programme.sub-title: Show Me Milwaukee: Inspiring Community and Honoring Home with Time Magazine's Most Influential Person
programme.desc: Join Greg and Maryam Durani as they explore Milwaukee from the eyes of their newest neighbors. Greg volunteers with kids at the library, hears powerful stories, and bakes specialty bread from Maryam's homeland. Don't miss this inspiring episode!

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Chaos & Kindness: Taking Kindness on Tour, One Final Act for Luv
programme.desc: The team sets out on a Chaos and Kindness road trip, committing to doing good at every stop, with a very special musical guest joining them at the end.

programme.title: Stitch
programme.sub-title: Stitch: Natural Wonders
programme.desc: Short stories show how to appreciate the amazing world around us.

programme.title: My Amazing Cheap Date
programme.sub-title: Cheap Date: Kung Fu & Hatchets
programme.desc: Snoballs, hatchet throwing, jazz and more on two cheap dates in New Orleans.

programme.title: Boston Rob Does Beantown
programme.sub-title: Boston Rob Does Beantown: Chinatown Treats
programme.desc: Rob feasts on fabulous cuisine, makes more than a few new friends and joins a trampoline gym class in one of Boston's oldest neighborhoods.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: Fundraising Scams
programme.desc: Crimes exploiting online generosity are a growing trend. These real-life stories show people going to great lengths to con unsuspecting donors out of their money.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Miya Marcano Story
programme.desc: When homesick college student Miya Marcano books a flight to south Florida for the weekend, her family is thrilled. But when the plane lands, Miya is nowhere to be found.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Plate It! Baltimore: Food Fit for Grandma's House
programme.desc: To Grandma's House we go! Chefs Mike Boggs and Nancy Longo face off, cooking up their favorite family recipes, but can they remember how Grandma used to make it?

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Eat Play Stay: Caving Into Fun In Lincoln, NE
programme.desc: Explore a historic cave with timeless messages on its walls. Savor every last crumb of a Cookie Monster waffle. Test your putt-putt skills on a hole designed to get the better of you.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.sub-title: Local Love: Jade’s Love Life Turns Upside Down
programme.desc: Stylishly single Jade is new to Sacramento dating scene and looking for love. Three exciting singles will try to impress her with throwing down at pottery, a day with animals and aerial silks.

programme.title: Ballin' in Baltimore
programme.sub-title: Ballin' in Baltimore: Chic DJ Tiara LaNiece Schools Angel in Charm City Street Style
programme.desc: Angel suits up with Radio DJ and fashionista Tiara LaNiece. They grab one-of-a-kind threads you can only find in Charm City, dance with the city's best hip hop crew, stop for some sweet treats and create an incredible graffiti mural.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Eat Play Stay: Go Fast or Take It Slow in Biloxi, MS
programme.desc: Live like a legend in this vibrant coastal city. Devour a Burger Burger Burger Burger, race high speed go-karts, climb to the top of a historic lighthouse and experience a level of fine dining that will make you want to “slap your mama!”

programme.title: The Middle Child
programme.sub-title: News 9 True Crime: The Middle Child
programme.desc: (2022) In the 1980s, a serial killer buried a woman and three girls in the woods of New Hampshire. One of those girls is still unidentified. WMUR joins the investigators who promise they won’t give up until her name is restored.

programme.title: Chronicle: Slice of the 'Burgh
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: (2023) An exploration into what makes Pittsburgh’s pizza scene so special, and the impact pizza shops have on their communities.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Chaos & Kindness: Running on Empty & Finishing with Family
programme.desc: Justin pushes body and mind through seven brutal marathons on seven continents in seven days. From frostbite in Antarctica to his daughter joining him for the final steps in Miami, this is the most intense and inspiring challenge of his life.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: One local single experiences some of the best their city has to offer on three blind dates. Our singles may spend three perfect days out on the town, but there can only be one love match. Who will be picked for a second date?

programme.title: Show Me Milwaukee
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Local radio personality, Greg Adams, wants to shine a light on all parts of his beloved city and prove that Milwaukee has a lot more to offer than people might expect. In each episode, Greg is joined by a notable personality from the community who shows him their favorite spots and the best ways to experience them.

programme.title: Hit Me With Your Best Spot
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: No one knows a city like the locals who live there. This series taps into the insider knowledge of notable figures including musicians, athletes, chefs, artists, influencers, and others who share their best spots to hit up in the city.

programme.title: Americas Most Delish
programme.sub-title: America's Most Delish Midwest: 10 Fried and Tried Midwest Foods to Excite Your Palate
programme.desc: Dive into the Midwest's fried delights. From Friday night fish fries to tasty testicles and fried grilled cheese? Enjoy the area's most iconic and delectable crispy fried goodness.

programme.title: My Perfect Day
programme.sub-title: My Perfect Day with Woman's Day: Kind-Hearted 10-year-old Gets Showered With Thanks
programme.desc: Catalina, a 10-year-old community hero with a heart of gold spends her days giving back. Today, Meaghan surprises Catalina with a day of her own, from Sea adventures to a new set of wheels and more. It's her time to shine.

programme.title: Weathering the Storm
programme.sub-title: Weathering the Storm: Couple Faces Historic Tornado on Eve of Wedding
programme.desc: On December 10, 2021, a violent tornado outbreak hit western Kentucky. It was the deadliest weather event in the history of the Commonwealth. But as families faced a bleak holiday season, hope emerged in surprising ways.

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Comedians, podcasters and craft beer enthusiasts Ed Bailey and Day Bracey explore hot spots, hidden gems and the best places to grab a cold brew in the 'Burgh.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Chefs recreate each other’s signature dish, but they can only determine what the dish is using their senses of taste, touch and smell. When the masks come off, the heat is on, with each chef attempting to cook their opponent’s creation.

programme.title: Matter of Fact
programme.sub-title: Matter of Fact: Rowhouse Rehab
programme.desc: This year, we're marking ten seasons as a show. Our goal has been to highlight you, Americans from across the country. Stories that mirrored our shared challenges are perseverance, ingenuity and compassion. Today, we take a look at some of those.

programme.title: Chronicle: Legacy of Flight 427
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: (2024) Recounting the tragedy of US Airways Flight 427 that crashed in Beaver County, and talking with families and first responders 30 years later.

programme.title: WTAE 4 The Record
programme.sub-title: 4 The Record: AG Dave Sunday and Insp. General Michelle Henry
programme.desc: This morning, Pennsylvania Attorney General Dave Sunday and Inspector General Michelle Henry discuss several topics, including an opioid settlement with Big Pharma that could mean Pennsylvania will get as much as $200 million.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Embark on amazing adventures across America with host Kinga Philipps who takes locals out of their comfort zones to experience transformation in the great outdoors.

programme.title: Sports Town Stories
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Each episode of this documentary series features incredible sports stories from iconic American cities. From gritty underdog victories to passionate unlikely match-ups, the series proves that sports are so much more than a pastime.

programme.title: On The Job
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Orlando expert, Brendan O'Connor, celebrates the people behind the scenes of the businesses that make Orlando a truly unique place. Join him as he rolls up his sleeves and receives hands on training while spending a day with them, On The Job.

programme.title: Free Spirit
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: In “Free Spirit,” award-winning bartender and host Kate Gerwin takes to the road and meets people in their workplaces and their favorite watering holes.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Finding Adventure: Screens Off, Adventure On!
programme.desc: Camryn Simpson, a 21-year-old student at the University of Pittsburgh and ambassador on social media platforms can’t take time away from her phone. With the help of Kinga, Camryn will log-out of social media and log-in to the outdoors to find adventure.

programme.title: The Middle Child
programme.sub-title: News 9 True Crime: The Middle Child
programme.desc: (2022) In the 1980s, a serial killer buried a woman and three girls in the woods of New Hampshire. One of those girls is still unidentified. WMUR joins the investigators who promise they won’t give up until her name is restored.

programme.title: Chronicle: Pittsburgh After Dark
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: (2024) In this episode of "Chronicle," we're going to look at the side of Pittsburgh you don't normally see: When the sun does down and the moon comes up.

programme.title: Underdog Uprising
programme.sub-title: Underdog Uprising
programme.desc: Every game day, fans pour into the stands to cheer on New Mexico's soccer team. But these are no ordinary supporters. From the Curse, to Sektor 114, to the Black Diamonds these fans are making New Mexico United.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: Serial Killers
programme.desc: Two serial killers whose chilling crimes left their communities devastated.
